sentences.sentence: The Power of myth is a book based on the conversations between mythologist Joseph Campbell and journalist Bill Moyers.

sentences.sentence: The great comparative mythologist Joseph Campbell once said, "People don't want the meaning of life, they want the experience of life.
sentences.translation: 伟大的比较学派神学大师约瑟夫.坎贝尔曾经说过，“人类不想了解生活本身的意义，他们只要生活的经历。”
